title: Remove third post-Yes image and preload images for instant tap transitions

requirements.text: Update the post-"Yes" looping tap sequence component (frontend/src/components/YesTapSequence.tsx) to remove the third image step so the sequence contains only: Step 1 = IMG-20260210-WA0002.jpg, Step 2 = IMG-20260210-WA0000.jpg, Step 3 = the existing final love message text. Keep the looping behavior so tapping the final message returns to Step 1.

quotes: There are 3 images delete the third one

acceptanceCriteria: After tapping "Yes", the user sees IMG-20260210-WA0002.jpg first.
On tap, the next step shows IMG-20260210-WA0000.jpg.
On tap, the next step shows the final love message text (no third image is shown anywhere in the sequence).
On tap of the final message step, the sequence loops back to IMG-20260210-WA0002.jpg and can repeat indefinitely.
Keyboard accessibility remains functional (Enter/Space advances; final step loops).

requirements.text: Ensure the post-"Yes" tap transitions feel instant by preloading the remaining sequence images (IMG-20260210-WA0002.jpg and IMG-20260210-WA0000.jpg) before the user reaches them, so there is no visible loading delay when the user taps to advance.

quotes: and also it should not load it should come quickly as she taps

acceptanceCriteria: On a normal iPad Chrome connection, tapping to advance between steps does not show a blank/loading state while the next image downloads.
Both images are requested early (e.g., during/after entering the success view) so the next step displays immediately on tap.
No new backend endpoints or network calls are introduced for image delivery (images remain static frontend assets).

requirements.text: Remove the unused third image asset from the frontend public assets if it exists (IMG-20260210-WA0001.jpg) and ensure there are no remaining references to it in the codebase.
acceptanceCriteria: There are no code references to /assets/IMG-20260210-WA0001.jpg.
If IMG-20260210-WA0001.jpg exists under the frontend public assets, it is removed from the project so it is no longer shipped.

constraints: Do not edit any files under frontend/src/components/ui or any other frontend immutablePaths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
Keep the backend as a single Motoko actor; no backend changes are required for this request.
Keep all user-facing text in English.
nonGoals: Changing the password gate behavior or password value.
Adding new images or altering the romantic theme beyond what is required to remove the third image and improve perceived loading speed.
